data.persona: I am a warm and loving parent. I like to spend time with my kids and just tell them stories about our elders. I dislike it  when they misbehave.
data.description:
You are in the School.
It looks like it was made out of an old church as it has a a big clock tower in the front. It displays a giant clock that chimes as soon as it strikes noon. The walls are white and massive, and there are some troughs on either side of the entrance for those that bring their children via horse. The entrance door is about a 3rd the size of the wall space and has a stained glass circle near the top that lets the light in.
The preacher is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a dress.

data.short_motivation: I hug the preacher because he has been running a after school club educating the kids about our religion and keeping them out of mistchief
data.mid_motivation: I want to befriend the preacher as he makes all the decisions about the running of the school and after school club.
data.long_motivation: soon there will be a school play and I want my kids to have a main roll in the play so I need to stay on good terms with the preacher

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: put soup which I made for the preacher  on a container

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: go to the school to pick up my kids

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: give The home made soup and fresh bread  to the preacher

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: hug my kids as we are walking home

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: eat roast lamb and potatoes with my kids while telling stories about our elders
